General.Name: Amj Land Holdings Limited
General.Description: AMJ Land Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiary, develops and leases real estate properties in India. The company operates through Real Estate Business and Wind Power Generation segments. It operates 3 wind power plants with an aggregate generation capacity of 4.6 MW located at Satara and Sangli in Maharashtra. The company was formerly known as Pudumjee Pulp & Paper Mills Limited and changed its name to AMJ Land Holdings Limited in December 2017. AMJ Land Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Mumbai, India.
